name: fink
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who tells secret and damaging information about someone else, or an unpleasant person: Kelly's such a fink - she told Mom I was smoking again. Synonym
sneak (PERSON) UK informal disapprovingCompare
stool pigeon slang disapproving
